course.subject: BIEN
course.name: Regulatory Affairs in the Healthcare Industry
course.description: This course aims at introducing basic principles of regulatory science and engineering as the foundation, while familiarizing students with product development, manufacturing, medical and engineering operations, and quality control / quality assurance processes in the pharmaceutical and medical device industry. Students will also be introduced to the associated regulatory requirements, with an emphasis on Hong Kong and the nearby region, in topics such as Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP), pharmaceutical product registration, pharmacovigilance, and clinical trials.
